entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 27. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of light snow late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill near minus 35. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. High minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
